attributes.action: Require airlines to issue auto cash refunds when flights holidays are cancelled
attributes.additional_details:
Please government, step in and stop the airlines doing this to us. 
Some of us have lost our jobs or been furloughed and living off a reduced wage. To have this money back would take a huge strain out of the current situation and day to day living. We shouldn’t even have to ask. It’s pure greed. They know who we all are. It should be a click of a button on their side (or ours) and the refund is done. We’d all be much happier and customers relations would be intact.
attributes.background: During Covid-19 more airlines are removing the ‘claim refund’ button from their websites instead you have to phone in but its always engaged. Those getting thro are steered to take vouchers/reschedule. This is unfair. Airlines could go bust or client die of the virus then these options expire!

rejection.details:
Arrangements for refunding, changing or rebooking travel are a matter for individual airlines and travel agents, not the Government or Parliament.

We have published a petition calling on the Government to create a fund to reimburse money lost due to covid-19 travel cancellations, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304912

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
